description: Welcome to this brand new, corner townhome at Forester II by Townline! This home offers 3 beds, 3 baths and 1,588 sq ft of bright and airy living space. On the main, enjoy a wide plan with a well-designed kitchen w/large island, USB chargers, gas cooktop and quartz counters. Generous living + dining seamlessly lead to a SOUTH facing balcony spanning nearly the width of the home. Up are 3 beds, primary fits a king with a WIC and spa-inspired ensuite. Thoughtful features include whisper grille rough-ins for portable A/C, closet organizers, flat-finished ceilings, finished side-by-side garage w/epoxy floor, EV rough in. Resort-style amenities include an outdoor pool, yoga studio, fitness centre, games room/ social lounge. Walking distance to schools, trails and future Burke Mountain Village.
